Tools used to develop WOWidget

02 Jun 2020

Programming

  • Xcode
  • App Store
  • GitHub
  • Swift, Storyboard

App Store subscription is the only service I (have to) pay for.
I've chosen Storyboard over SwiftUI because I wanted to support iOS 12. According to the App Store statistics it is still used on ~20% devices (at the time of writing this post).

Design

  • Photopea

Photopea is a free „Photoshop” in a browser. Supporting PSD, Sketch and many other formats.

Video

  • Mousecape
  • QuickTime Player
  • Final Cut Pro X Trial

I wrote about recording videos.

Website

  • GitHub
  • GitHub Pages
  • Jekyll
  • Sublime Text

Website content is stored on GitHub and every commit is automatically processed by Jekyll and hosted on GitHub Pages.
